    B

    BonjourBrowser - Class in Unnamed Package
    Title: Java BonjourBrowser
    BonjourBrowser() - Constructor for class BonjourBrowser
    Constructs a new BonjourBrowser.
    Sets the GUI property and initializes the browser implementation.
    BonjourBrowserElement - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class to encapsulate the structures that Bonjour returns.
    BonjourBrowserElement(DNSSDService, int, int, String, String, int, TXTRecord) - Constructor for class BonjourBrowserElement
    Creates browser elements when a service is resolved.
    BonjourBrowserElement(DNSSDService, int, int, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class BonjourBrowserElement
    Creates browser elements when a service is found (not yet resolved).
    BonjourBrowserImpl - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class to implement the BonjourBrowserInterface.
    BonjourBrowserImpl(BonjourBrowser) - Constructor for class BonjourBrowserImpl
    Constructs a new BonjourBrowserImpl.
    Implements the interface of the browser.
    BonjourBrowserInterface - Interface in Unnamed Package
    Interface defining operations for managing Bonjour service discovery UI.
    BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class for implementation of a listener for general service advertisements.
